languages.text: Но, хоть сердце ее тосковало по дому, она не могла оставить элантаха. Отвергнутая собратьями, лишенная камня душ и защиты от липких лап Слаанеш, эльдарка чахла, словно птица в клетке. Ирлиэт стала все чаще погружаться в медитацию, дабы сбежать от удушающей реальности, и с каждым разом все дольше длились ее поиски новых сил в глубинах собственной души.

But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.
languages.original_text: Но, хоть сердце ее тосковало по дому, она не могла оставить элантаха. Отвергнутая собратьями, лишенная камня душ и защиты от липких лап Слаанеш, эльдарка чахла, словно птица в клетке. Ирлиэт стала все чаще погружаться в медитацию, дабы сбежать от удушающей реальности, и с каждым разом все дольше длились ее поиски новых сил в глубинах собственной души.

traits.locale_text: Even if her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin, left without spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away as a bird in a cage. Yrliet could be more and more often found in meditation, as she was trying to run from suffocating reality. And with every time, her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

Even if her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin, left without spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away as a bird in a cage. Yrliet could be more and more often found in meditation, as she was trying to run from suffocating reality. And with every time, her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

But even if her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away as a bird in a cage. Yrliet was found more and more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

But even if her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away as a bird in a cage. Yrliet was found more and more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

languages.text: 但纵使她内心十分渴望回到故乡，她也无法离开她的外界人身边。这位艾达灵族被族人拒之门外，又失去了灵魂石，无法保护自己免受色孽魔爪的伤害，于是她像笼子里的鸟儿一样逐渐枯萎。人们发现，伊莉耶特越来越频繁地陷入冥想，试图逃离这令人窒息的现实。她从灵魂深处汲取力量，但每次冥想花的时间都会越来越长。
languages.original_text: But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

traits.locale_text: 但纵使她内心十分渴望回到故乡，她也无法离开她的外界人身边。这位艾达灵族被族人拒之门外，又失去了灵魂石，无法保护自己免受色孽魔爪的伤害，于是她像笼子里的鸟儿一样逐渐枯萎。人们发现，伊莉耶特越来越频繁地陷入冥想，试图逃离这令人窒息的现实。她从灵魂深处汲取力量，但每次冥想花的时间都会越来越长。

languages.text: Doch auch, wenn ihr Herz sich nach der Heimat sehnte, konnte sie ihren Elantach nicht verlassen. Von ihrer Sippe abgelehnt, ohne Seelenstein und damit ohne Schutz gegen die schändlichen Klauen von Slaanesh, verkümmerte die Aeldari wie ein Vogel in einem Käfig. Yrliet war immer öfter meditierend anzutreffen, denn so versuchte sie, ihrer erdrückenden Realität zu entkommen. Mit jedem Mal dauerte ihre Suche nach Stärke in den Tiefen ihrer Seele länger und länger.
languages.original_text: But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

traits.locale_text: Doch auch, wenn ihr Herz sich nach der Heimat sehnte, konnte sie ihren Elantach nicht verlassen. Von ihrer Sippe abgelehnt, ohne Seelenstein und damit ohne Schutz gegen die schändlichen Klauen von Slaanesh, verkümmerte die Aeldari wie ein Vogel in einem Käfig. Yrliet war immer öfter meditierend anzutreffen, denn so versuchte sie, ihrer erdrückenden Realität zu entkommen. Mit jedem Mal dauerte ihre Suche nach Stärke in den Tiefen ihrer Seele länger und länger.

languages.text: Mais même si son cœur se languissait de son foyer, elle ne put quitter son elantach. Rejetée par les siens et privée d'une pierre-esprit ou de toute protection contre les répugnantes griffes de Slaanesh, l'Aeldari dépérit comme un oiseau en cage. Ainsi, Yrliet s'abîma de plus en plus souvent dans la méditation pour échapper à sa réalité suffocante et trouver toujours plus difficilement dans les profondeurs de son âme la force de continuer à vivre.
languages.original_text: But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

traits.locale_text: Même si son cœur se languissait de son foyer, elle ne put quitter son elantach. Rejetée par les siens et privée d'une pierre d'âme ou de toute protection contre les répugnantes griffes de Slaanesh, l'Aeldari dépérit comme un oiseau en cage. Ainsi, Yrliet s'abîma de plus en plus souvent dans la méditation pour échapper à sa réalité suffocante et trouver toujours plus difficilement dans les profondeurs de son âme la force de continuer à vivre.

languages.text: Pero incluso cuando su corazón añoraba su hogar, no podía abandonar a su elantach. Rechazada por los suyos y privada de su joya espiritual y la protección contra las sucias garras de Slaanesh, la Aeldari se marchitó como un pájaro enjaulado. Cada vez era más frecuente encontrarse a Yrliet meditando, intentando escapar de su asfixiante realidad. Su búsqueda de fuerza en las profundidades de su alma le llevaba más tiempo con cada intento.
languages.original_text: But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

traits.locale_text: Pero incluso cuando su corazón añoraba su hogar, no podía abandonar a su elantach. Rechazada por los suyos y privada de su joya espiritual y la protección contra las sucias garras de Slaanesh, la Aeldari se marchitó como un pájaro enjaulado. Cada vez era más frecuente encontrarse a Yrliet meditando, intentando escapar de su asfixiante realidad. Su búsqueda de fuerza en las profundidades de su alma le llevaba más tiempo con cada intento.

languages.text: 心が故郷に焦がれていても、彼女はエランタのもとを離れることができなかった。同族に拒まれ、魂縛石を奪われて、スラーネッシュの汚わしき爪の庇護を失ったアエルダリは、籠の鳥としてしおれていった。ユリエットは息苦しい現実から逃れようと、瞑想中の姿を見せることが次第に多くなった。魂の奥底で強さを求める彼女の旅は、その度に長さを増していった。
languages.original_text: But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

traits.locale_text: 心が故郷に焦がれていても、彼女はエランタのもとを離れることができなかった。同族に拒まれ、魂縛石を奪われて、スラーネッシュの汚わしき爪の庇護を失ったアエルダリは、籠の鳥としてしおれていった。ユリエットは息苦しい現実から逃れようと、瞑想中の姿を見せることが次第に多くなった。魂の奥底で強さを求める彼女の旅は、その度に長さを増していった。

languages.text: Yüreği evini özlüyor olsa da elantach'ını bırakamadı. Soydaşları tarafından reddedilen, ruh taşından mahrum olup Slaanesh'in pis pençelerine karşı savunmasız kalan Aeldari, kafesteki bir kuş gibi soldu. Yrliet, sıklıkla meditasyon yapıyor ve boğucu gerçekliğinden kaçmaya çalışıyordu. Ruhunun derinliklerindeki gücü arayıp bulması, her seferinde daha uzun sürüyordu.
languages.original_text: But though her heart ached for home, she could not leave her elantach. Rejected by her kin and deprived of a spirit stone and protection from the filthy claws of Slaanesh, the Aeldari withered away like a bird in a cage. Yrliet was to be found more often in meditation, trying to escape her suffocating reality. Each time her search for strength in the depths of her soul took longer and longer.

traits.locale_text: Ancak yüreği evini özlüyor olsa da elantach'ını bırakamadı. Soydaşları tarafından reddedilen ve bir ruh taşından ve Slaanesh'in pis pençelerine karşı korumadan mahrum kalan Aeldari, kafesteki bir kuş gibi soldu. Yrliet sıklıkla meditasyon yapıyor ve boğucu gerçekliğinden kaçmaya çalışıyordu. Ruhunun derinliklerindeki gücü arayıp bulması, her seferinde daha uzun sürüyordu.
